name: ASANA__GET_USER
description: Retrieve details of a specific user in Asana.

user_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the user.

name: ASANA__LIST_USERS
description: List all users in a workspace.

workspace_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

name: ASANA__GET_USER_TASK_LIST
description: Retrieve the task list of a specific user in a specific workspace.

user_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the user.

workspace.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace gid.

name: ASANA__GET_TASKS_FROM_USER_TASK_LIST
description: Retrieve tasks from a specific user task list.

user_task_list_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the user task list.

completed_since.description: Only return tasks that are incomplete or completed since this time.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return.

name: ASANA__CREATE_TASK
description: Create a new task in a specific workspace or project.

body.description: Body parameters for creating a task

workspace.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

notes.description: Additional notes or description for the task.
notes.example: This is a description of the task.

assignee.description: The assignee of the task. Can be a user ID or 'me'.

projects.description: List of project IDs to associate the task with.

due_date.description: The due date of the task in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: ASANA__DELETE_TASK
description: Delete a specific task by its globally unique identifier.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task to delete.

name: ASANA__UPDATE_TASK
description: Update an existing task in Asana with new information such as name, notes, assignee, due date, and completion status.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task to update.

body.description: Body parameters for updating a task

name.description: The updated name of the task.

notes.description: Updated notes or description for the task.

assignee.description: The updated assignee of the task. Can be a user ID or 'me'.

due_date.description: The updated due date of the task in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: ASANA__GET_TASK
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific task by its globally unique identifier.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

name: ASANA__LIST_PROJECTS
description: List all projects in a workspace that are accessible to the authenticated user.

workspace_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

limit.description: Maximum number of projects to return.

archived.description: Only return archived projects if true.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

name: ASANA__GET_PROJECT
description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific project by its globally unique identifier.

project_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

name: ASANA__CREATE_PROJECT
description: Create a new project in a specific workspace with customizable settings.

body.description: Body parameters for creating a project

notes.description: Description or notes for the project.
notes.example: This is a project for managing tasks.

workspace.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

team.description: Globally unique identifier for the team this project belongs to.

privacy_setting.description: The privacy setting of the project.

due_date.description: The due date of the project in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: ASANA__LIST_PROJECT_TASKS
description: Retrieve all tasks within a specific project with filtering and pagination options.

project_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

completed_since.description: Only return tasks that are incomplete or completed since this time.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return.

name: ASANA__SEARCH_TASKS
description: Search for tasks across all accessible workspaces and projects using text queries and filters.

workspace_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

text.description: Text to search for in task names and notes.

assignee.any.description: Comma-separated list of user IDs to filter by assignee.

projects.any.description: Comma-separated list of project IDs to filter by.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

limit.description: Maximum number of tasks to return.

name: ASANA__LIST_WORKSPACES
description: List all workspaces accessible to the authenticated user.

limit.description: Maximum number of workspaces to return.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

name: ASANA__ADD_TASK_TO_PROJECT
description: Add an existing task to a project, allowing tasks to be part of multiple projects.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task.

body.description: Body parameters for adding task to project

project.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

insert_after.description: Task to insert this task after in the project. Use null to insert at the beginning.

name: ASANA__REMOVE_TASK_FROM_PROJECT
description: Remove a task from a project in Asana while keeping the task accessible in other projects.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task.

body.description: Body parameters for removing task from project

project.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

name: ASANA__UPDATE_PROJECT
description: Update an existing project in Asana with new name, description, settings, or team assignment.

project_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

body.description: Body parameters for updating a project

notes.description: Updated description or notes for the project.

due_date.description: Updated due date of the project in YYYY-MM-DD format.

privacy_setting.description: Updated privacy setting of the project.

name: ASANA__DELETE_PROJECT
description: Delete a project from Asana permanently, removing it and all associated tasks from the workspace.

project_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the project.

name: ASANA__GET_TEAMS
description: Retrieve teams in a workspace that are accessible to the authenticated user.

workspace_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

limit.description: Maximum number of teams to return.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

name: ASANA__GET_TEAM_MEMBERS
description: Retrieve all members of a specific team in Asana with their roles and access levels.

team_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the team.

limit.description: Maximum number of users to return.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

name: ASANA__CREATE_SUBTASK
description: Create a subtask under an existing task in Asana for more detailed work breakdown.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the parent task.

body.description: Body parameters for creating a subtask

notes.description: Additional notes or description for the subtask.

assignee.description: The assignee of the subtask. Can be a user ID or 'me'.

due_date.description: The due date of the subtask in YYYY-MM-DD format.

name: ASANA__GET_SUBTASKS
description: Retrieve all subtasks for a specific task in Asana with their completion status and details.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the parent task.

opt_fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response.

limit.description: Maximum number of subtasks to return.

description: Add a comment to a task in Asana for collaboration and progress tracking.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task.

text.description: The text content of the comment.

html_text.description: HTML formatted text content of the comment.

name: ASANA__CREATE_PROJECT_STATUS_UPDATE
description: Create a status update for a project in Asana to communicate progress and milestones to stakeholders.

body.description: Body parameters for creating project status

text.description: The text content of the status update.

html_text.description: HTML formatted text content of the status update.

description: Retrieve all status updates for a project in Asana to track progress history and milestones.

name: ASANA__CREATE_ATTACHMENT
description: Upload an attachment to a task in Asana, supporting various file types for documentation.

body.description: Body parameters for creating an attachment

parent.description: Globally unique identifier for the task to attach to.

name: ASANA__GET_CUSTOM_FIELDS
description: Retrieve custom fields available in a workspace for enhanced task and project metadata.

workspace_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

name: ASANA__UPDATE_TASK_CUSTOM_FIELD
description: Update the value of a custom field on a specific task in Asana for enhanced metadata tracking.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task.

body.description: Body parameters for updating custom field

custom_fields.description: Object mapping custom field GIDs to their new values.

name: ASANA__GET_PORTFOLIOS
description: Retrieve portfolios in a workspace for high-level project organization and tracking.

workspace_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

limit.description: Maximum number of portfolios to return.

name: ASANA__CREATE_PORTFOLIO
description: Create a new portfolio in Asana for organizing and tracking multiple related projects.

body.description: Body parameters for creating a portfolio

workspace.description: Globally unique identifier for the workspace.

public.description: Whether the portfolio is public to the workspace.

name: ASANA__ADD_PROJECT_TO_PORTFOLIO
description: Add an existing project to a portfolio in Asana for better organization and oversight.

portfolio_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the portfolio.

body.description: Body parameters for adding project to portfolio

item.description: Globally unique identifier for the project to add.

insert_after.description: Project to insert this project after. Use null for beginning.

name: ASANA__GET_TASK_DEPENDENCIES
description: Retrieve dependencies for a specific task in Asana to understand task relationships and blocking issues.

description: Add a dependency relationship between tasks in Asana to enforce proper task sequencing.

task_gid.description: Globally unique identifier for the task.

dependencies.description: Array of task GIDs that this task depends on.

description: Add a tag to a task in Asana for better categorization and project organization.
